hero.title: Make your perfect
hero.subtitle: even better
hero.description: Experience exceptional dental care in a comfortable, family-friendly environment. Our team is dedicated to helping you achieve and maintain a healthy, beautiful smile.

about.title: The Modern & Clinical Approach
about.subtitle: To Dental Care
about.description: At Freeport Family Dentistry, we combine state-of-the-art technology with compassionate care to provide you with the best dental experience possible. Our modern facility and experienced team ensure that every visit is comfortable and effective.

services.title: High Quality Services
services.description: We offer comprehensive dental services to meet all your oral health needs, from routine cleanings to advanced restorative procedures.

items.title: General Dental Care
items.description: Comprehensive exams, cleanings, fillings, and preventive care to maintain your oral health.

items.title: Dental Implants
items.description: Permanent tooth replacement solutions that look, feel, and function like natural teeth.

items.title: Cosmetic Dentistry
items.description: Enhance your smile with teeth whitening, veneers, and other cosmetic treatments.

items.title: Orthodontics
items.description: Straighten your teeth with Invisalign clear aligners or traditional braces.

items.name: Sarah Johnson
items.content: I had an excellent experience at Freeport Family Dentistry. The staff was friendly and professional, and Dr. Smith made me feel completely at ease during my procedure.

items.name: Michael Chen
items.content: Best dental office I've ever been to! They really take the time to explain everything and make sure you're comfortable. Highly recommend their teeth whitening service.

items.name: Emily Rodriguez
items.content: The entire team is wonderful. They're great with my kids and make dental visits something we actually look forward to. Thank you for taking such great care of our family!

cta.title: Get a FREE Consultation
cta.description: Ready to transform your smile? Schedule a free consultation with our dental experts today.

insurance.title: Insurance Providers
insurance.description: We are in-network with the following insurance carriers:
additionalInfo: We accept most major insurance plans
In-house membership plans for uninsured patients

careCredit.title: CareCredit
careCredit.subtitle: Discounts & Memberships
careCredit.description: For patients without insurance, we offer flexible financing options through CareCredit and our in-house membership plans.

specialOffer.title: Special Offer
specialOffer.description: NEW PATIENT SPECIAL - Save on your first visit with our new patient package!

items.title: The Science of a Perfect Smile
items.excerpt: Discover the latest advancements in cosmetic dentistry and how they can transform your smile.

items.title: Innovations in Modern Restoration
items.excerpt: Learn about the cutting-edge technologies we use for dental restorations.

items.title: Investing in Long-Term Health
items.excerpt: Why preventive dental care is the best investment for your overall health.

booking.subtitle: Select Date & Time
booking.description: Choose a convenient time for your visit. We'll confirm your appointment within 24 hours.
